attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: once the ban comes into force about smoking, i dont think prisoners should be allowed to smoke either, there is no use in having a ban on smoking in public places when these people in prisons are allowed to continue to smoke once the ban comes in,there are some prisoners/officers who dont smoke and its not fair on them,or is it one law for us and another one for the convicts THE BAN IS FOR EVERYONE

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
